description.value: You're always on the lookout for supplies and valuables. Each time you use the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Seek] action to search for objects (including secret doors and hazards), you can search for objects in your choice of a @Template[type:emanation|distance:10] around you or an adjacent 15-foot-by-15-foot area, rather than a single adjacent 10-foot-by-10-foot area.
